mapper.insert: insert into coupon_template (name, type, discount_type, discount_value, min_amount, max_discount, total_count, used_count, per_user_limit, valid_days, start_time, end_time, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{type}, #{discountType}, #{discountValue}, #{minAmount}, #{maxDiscount}, #{totalCount}, #{usedCount}, #{perUserLimit}, #{validDays}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update: update coupon_template set status = #{status}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(c.id) as totalCoupons, count(case when c.status = 1 then 1 end) as usedCoupons, count(case when c.status = 2 then 1 end) as expiredCoupons, coalesce(sum(oc.discount_amount), 0) as totalDiscount from coupon c left join order_coupon oc on c.id = oc.coupon_id left join coupon_template ct on c.template_id = ct.id where c.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select * from coupon_template where status = 1 and start_time <= now() and end_time >= now()
